info.name: DEVClubSOC
info.description: This Collection of APIs is meant to be used for the website : [http://uniquedex100.iitd.site/ecommerce/]() and contain a collection of 7 APIs which can be easily used to access, create, delete and modify the products listed on above website.

request.description:
# _**Get All Products**_

This api can be used to fetch details of all the products available on the website and provide them in form of JSON text. Just send a request to the given link and it will return the desired values.

# _**Get a Single Product (By ID)**_

This API can be used to get any product available on the marketplace by simply passing an ID along with the request. Send a get request to the given link along with a valid index and it will return the product details.

# _**Add a Product**_

This API can be used to add a product to the marketplace after successfully logging in. First generate a Bearer access token by going to link `/ecommerce/api/token` or by using the **API for login** and then paste it in the token section of authorization header after selecting bearer token. Then add the details of product in the Body as form data in form of JSON. Details may include `productIndex`, `productName`, `productPrice` and `productDescription`. Then send the `PUT` request.

# _**Delete a Product**_

This API can be used to detail any product after successfully logging in. It requires a proper Bearer Token which can be generated by going to `ecommerce/api/token` or by using **API for login**. Append the index of the product that you want to delete and send it as a `delete` method.

# _**Purchase a Product**_

This API can be used to purchaseany product after successfully logging in. It requires a proper Bearer Token which can be generated by going to `ecommerce/api/token` or by using **API for login**. Append the index of the product that you want to purchase and send it as a `GET` method.

# _**API for Login**_

This API can be used to get a JSON token in order to use any api like `Add a Product` , `Delete a Product` or `Purchase a Product`.

##### Getting Started

First add your `username` and `password` to form data in body of request. They can be created by registering first using `API for Signup`. Then send the request using `post` method

###### To Do Next

The API returns two tokens namely `Refresh` and `Access`: Use access token to access the above mentioned apis and use the refresh token to regenerate your access token after it expires after 10 minutes.

# _**API for signup**_

This API can be used to enter your credentials to the server so that you can login in future. In order to signup, provide your username and password in formdata in body and send a `POST` request to the given link.
